title: Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse)
description: We celebrate one year of the podcast with Jeff Glucker of Hooniverse. We talk about bullet proof cars, the standing mile, the new Mazda 6, Lexus LS 460 F Sport, Ford's new 3 cylinder Ecoboost, and compare radar detectors.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: We celebrate one year of the podcast with Jeff Glucker of Hooniverse. We talk about bullet proof cars, the standing mile, the new Mazda 6, Lexus LS 460 F Sport, Ford's new 3 cylinder Ecoboost, and compare radar detectors.
